r.s: PEAR2_Console_Color is a Package to provide a easy way to print text in
r.d: command line when its necessary. Have a simple interface and basicly using the static function 'convert' you can make use of this Object.
r.n:
Iniciar cover of needs to echo messages to command with color, background and styles Trying to use the save public interface the PEAR/Console_Color to provide a way to use as 4.* (PEAR) or 5.* (PEAR2)
Package Console_Color API release notes for version 0.1.0.
